H0.text: Which European country's flag is a blue cross on a white background. Greece

H1.text: Which European country's flag is a blue cross on a white background. Sweden

H2.text: Which European country's flag is a blue cross on a white background. Norway

H3.text: Which European country's flag is a blue cross on a white background. FinlanD

A4.text: The national flag of Finland, also known in Finnish as the siniristilippu ('Blue Cross Flag'), dates from the beginning of the 20th century.
